Personal Projects

Vantor Engine

Vantor is a data-oriented, modular game engine built for real-time rendering, 2D/3D simulations, and procedural generation for open world games. Designed for creators who value flexibility and low-level access.

🔧 Modular Architecture

Plug-and-play systems: physics, input, rendering, audio — all decoupled and customizable.

🚀 Experimental Rendering

Built on top of multiple APIs to support rendering on consoles.

📦 Built-In Tooling

Includes an integrated CLI for managing projects and cross-building the engine.

🎮 Custom Media Layer

An abstracted pipeline for supporting audio, input, ... on multiple devices.

🧠 Data-Oriented

Vantor is data oriented and can be controlled with json, xml and binary formats.

🖼️ Procedural landscapes

The Engine is designed to create beautiful generated terrain based on No Mans Skys algorythms.


Take a look ✨
